title: Limelight
description: Random weft floats of various threads and textures, on plain weave ground. Plain weave variation. Grey, beige, white & metallic warp. Grey weft. Machine stitched on four sides. Tag inside folder reads \"Limelight, HDY/16A/3, 50\", linen, metlon, cotton & viscose\" (grey, beige, white, gold metallic)
